mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, pwd, name, phone) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT qna.*, comment.content cmt, user.name, user.author FROM qna LEFT JOIN comment ON qna.id = comment.qna_id LEFT JOIN user ON qna.user_id = user.id ORDER BY qna.id desc LiMIT #{offset},#{perPager}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(title, content, date, user_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, Now(), #{userId})
INSERT INTO comment(content, date, qna_id) VALUES(#{content}, Now(), #{id})
mapper.select: select n.*, (SELECT id FROM notice where id > #{id} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1) prev, (SELECT id FROM notice where id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1) next from notice n where id=#{id}
select * from notice where id = (select max(id) from notice)
select name,id from user where author=1 and id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update notice set view=view+1 where id=#{id}
